title: Can the common app letter of recommendation of the teachers be sent through the school's mail ID if they do not have a recommenders account? - Quora

response.answer_text: It has been a very long time since I wrote my first Common App letter so my memory is rusty, but I don’t recollect that the process of registering a recommender’s account was onerous at all. It may have taken 5 minutes or less. So, I don’t understand the premise of the question. Why does the teacher not have such an account?
